name: Blue J
description: Blue J is a cross of TGA Subcool’s Jillybean and Oregon Blue by Heroes of The Farm. Raised by Geek Farms, this potent cross combines exceptionally flavorful West Coast genetics to create a unique strain with robust and stable attributes. It boasts a freshly baked blueberry muffin aroma that fills the room with sweet, herbaceous smoke. Blue J is a solid option for cannabis consumers looking to stimulate their appetite and invigorate their mind.
descriptionPlain: Blue J is a cross of TGA Subcool’s Jillybean and Oregon Blue by Heroes of The Farm. Raised by Geek Farms, this potent cross combines exceptionally flavorful West Coast genetics to create a unique strain with robust and stable attributes. Blue J is a solid option for cannabis consumers looking to stimulate their appetite and invigorate their mind.

highlightedReviews.text: Awesome!  It taste like limes! It leaves a minty lime taste in the mouth that's very pleasant!  I have it in a super quality extracted concentrate and wow!  The flavor profile is so unique!  Must try it for yourself if u see it!

Nothing but positive vibes from this strain. Smells like blueberry, tastes like blueberry lime candy! A very: happy, uplifting, and giddy high at times. No matter how youâ€™re feeling, this will put a smile on your face! Highly recommend this sweet tasting smooth smoking strain.
